ygData.subject: Re: "Peace" at the Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantopulous: I understand what you are saying, but I live in a code of honor. My parents didn t have it, but I do. I will fight to the death if I must, but I

From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Tarantopulous: I understand what you are saying, but I live in a code of
honor. My parents didn't have it, but I do. I will fight to the death if I
must, but I will never surrender. I think only of my fellow Maximals when I
say that I will never give in...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:28 PM
Subject: Re: "Peace" at the Cybertronian Fire


> Oh, I just remembered! Prodigy, you said the Alliance destroyed the
> Ark. That's completely untrue. The Trainers destroyed the Ark.
>
>
> ::Kluster::
>
> Kluster frowns, looking over at Tarantoupulous. His one hand
> unconscioustly slid down to cradle the stump of his left hand.
>
> "On the contrary, you are thinking only of yourself, my friend. I
> agree with Iron Raptor, and I am an experienced Maximal commander.
> Fighting to the death will get you nowhere, and if we fight right now
> it will be to certain death. Tell me, what would we gain by dying
> now? We would give the Alliance power. They can take save some of our
> bodies and use them as fresh troops, they could take the CF and have
> THREE bases instead of two. They would be all the more powerful. But
> if we play peaceful now, we can rebuild our base, we can repair
> ourselves, and then we will be there to fight them next time.
> Fighting to the end is what young and unexperienced bots think is
> honorable. Its not, its simply foolish. If you want to make an impact
> on the world, you should try to live to do it, and throwing your life
> away isn't worth it."
>
> He looks into the bot's eyes, trying to make him understand. "I hope
> you understand what I'm saying, because it is very good advice. Iron
> Raptor can't possibly not try to save our lives. We are her
> responsibility in a way, and our safety is her prime priority."
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Tarantoupulous responding to Iron Raptor: You are thinking only of
> yourself.
> > I may be new here, but I know very well that you never surrender,
> even if
> > you must die...
>
>
>
>
